line.originaltext: 6 apples
1 (16 ounce) can whole cranberry sauce
line.annotation: create_ing(ing59, "1 (16 ounce) can whole cranberry sauce")

line.originaltext: 1/2 cup packed brown sugar
1/3 cup all-purpose flour
1 1/2 teaspoons ground cinnamon
1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg
1 recipe pastry for a 9 inch double crust pie
line.annotation: create_ing(ing64, "1 recipe pastry for a 9 inch double crust pie")

line.originaltext: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Line a pie plate with pastry.
Line a pie plate with pastry.
Peel, core, and slice the apples.
line.annotation: cut(ing58, , ing65, "peeled, cored, and sliced apples", "peel, core, and slice")

line.originaltext: Combine apples and cranberry sauce in a medium-sized mixing bowl.
Combine apples and cranberry sauce in a medium-sized mixing bowl.
Combine brown sugar, flour, cinnamon, and nutmeg; add to the apple mixture.
line.annotation: combine({ing60, ing61, ing62, ing63, ing66}, ing67, "filling", "add to bowl")

line.originaltext: Mix thoroughly.
Turn filling into the pastry lined pan.
line.annotation: combine({ing64, ing68}, ing69, "uncovered pie", "turn filling into pastry")

line.originaltext: Cover with top crust.
Cover with top crust.
Crimp edges.
Cut slits in top crust.
line.annotation: cut(ing72, , ing73, "unbaked pie", "slits in top crust")

line.originaltext: Bake for 1 hour, or until the crust is golden brown and the filling bubbly.
line.annotation: cook(ing73, t12, ing74, "baked pie", "1 hour, or golden brown")

line.originaltext: Bake for 1 hour, or until the crust is golden brown and the filling bubbly.
